alert.note: Alert for Guanica; Guayanilla (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 27 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Guanica, Guayanilla, Juana Diaz, Penuelas, Ponce, Sabana Grande, Villalba and Yauco. * WHEN...Until 800 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 500 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ponce, Yauco, Penuelas, Guayanilla, Juana Diaz, Villalba, Guanica, Sabana Grande, Tallaboa Alta, Santo Domingo, Coto Laurel, Aguilita, Capitanejo, Luis Llorens Torres, Guayabal, Potala Pastillo, Palomas, Marueno, Tallaboa and Magas Arriba. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
